module.p:
Corpus examples –
[...] ’Se glé bheag de chobhair a thug a’ Phàrlamaid a riamh do ’n Ghàidhlig no do fhoghlum agus do litreachas na Gàidhlig. [...] Dé na rudan a dh’ fhaodadh sinn iarraidh? Tuilleadh de luchd-teagaisg ’s de luchd-ceasnachaidh Gàidhlig. Airgead gu leabhraichean uallachadh is a chlo-bhualadh. Barrachd tìde air an réidio agus air telebhisean. [...] Chan eil an sin ach rud no dhà a dh’ fhaodamaid iarraidh. [...]
[...] The Parliament has given very little assistance ever to the Gaelic language or to Gaelic education and literature. [...] What are the things that we could demand? More Gaelic teachers and inspectors. Money to prepare and print books. More time on the radio and on television. [...] Those are just a couple of things that we could demand. [...] td. 9, ‘Air an Spiris’

li.gd: Tha ar linn fhìn a’ coimhead gur e feallsanach mór a bh’ ann de Khierkegaard, gidheadh feallsanach eu-coltach ri a roi-shealbhadairean, ach a-mhàin, ’s math dh’ fhaoite, Nietzche.
li.tr: Our own era views Kierkegaard as a great philosopher, even if a philosopher different to his predecessors, aside from, perhaps, Nietzsche.
